game.name: Ecto Mercenary Program
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 텍스트 크기 조절, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ecto Mercenary Program is a sci-fi looter shooter where you and your friends form a mercenary group to forge a path for yourselves. Rise from a destitute crew fighting raiders for scraps to a feared force on the station. Survival is not guaranteed.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ecto Mercenary Program is a sci-fi looter shooter where you and your friends form a mercenary group to forge a path for yourselves. Rise from a destitute crew fighting raiders for scraps to a feared force on the station. Survival is not guaranteed.
